text: Lɨdaci 4.25 Mk 3.7-8 hulaŋ iamɨgali akape sɨbaŋ agɨlaŋ iahaiaha nɨbu hula uavɨhadami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali hɨhɨle Galili fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ. Hɨhɨle Dekapolisɨ fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ. Hɨhɨle Jelusalem haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ. Hɨhɨle Judia fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ. Hulaŋ iamɨgali Jolɨdan avɨli agadɨ limu caba heŋ hɨniavɨhadami agɨlaŋ avi iahaiaha nɨbu hula uavɨhadami.
